name: DFF NT: Legatus of the XIIth,  Zenos yae Galvus's Extra Appearance
detailed_description:
FINAL FANTASY XIV: Shadowbringers Release Campaign
Receive a complimentary special appearance for Zenos yae Galvus for a limited time!
Campaign Period: July 2nd 16:00 UTC to August 7th at 15:59 UTC.

Allows Zenos yae Galvus to equip the Legatus of the XIIth appearance.

* You must first purchase the game DISSIDIA FINAL FANTASY NT or download DISSIDA FINAL FANTASY NT Free Edition before you can use this content.

* You must first purchase the Zenos yae Galvus Starter Pack before you can use this content.
